name: Donut Factory
description:
Do you love throwing stuff, smashing objects and playing with your food. Then Donut Factory is the game for you!

Controls:

  • Look/Aim - Mouse
  • Move - W, A, S, D
  • Grab/Throw Donuts - Left Mouse Button

Credits:

  • Music: https://www.bensound.com/
  • SFX: https://freesound.org/
  • Tutorial Text: https://fontmeme.com/
  • Models - Unity Store: 
    • "Low Poly: Free Pack" - AxeyWorks
    • "Low Poly Street Pack" - Dynamic Art
    • "Low Poly European City Pack" - Karboosx
    • "Prototyping Pack (Free)" - DigitalKonstrukt
    • "Simple Cars Pack" - MyxerMan
    • "Low Poly Ground" - Juanktigre
    • "Low Poly GUI Kit" - SystemEra GmbH 
  • Other Models: 
    • "Furniture Kit" - Kenney - https://kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit
    • Donut Model - https://www.turbosquid.com/Search/3D-Models/free/low-poly/donut
